title: Biden’s Cabinet Picks Are Lining Up for the Great Reset | 1/14/21
description:
Glenn shares a song that has helped calm him during these troubling times. Thousands of National Guard members are in D.C. for the inauguration, and it’s a frightening sight. Gwyneth Paltrow is leaving acting behind. Joe Biden’s proposed Cabinet is riddled with connections to Big Tech and financial giants, and Glenn shows how dedicated many of them are to the Great Reset. Forbes is under fire after an editor threatened companies that hire former Trump officials. AOC wants Congress to form a commission to “rein in” conservative media after the Capitol riot and also called for the “liberation” of southern states. Glenn shares his fears of what might occur next week and urges listeners to stay safe and aware. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
